name: Uttarakhand Association for Positive People Living With HIV/AIDS
briefDescription: Uttarakhand Association for Positive People living with HIV/AIDS" is a Community-Based-Organization (CBO) working on HIV/AIDS since February 2010. Through the years, 'Uttarakhand Association for Positive People living with HIV/AIDS' has involved the community and has evolved, implemented a holistic approach to combat HIV/AIDS, focusing on prevention as well as treatment adherence in Uttarakhand. Our focus is on reaching out to marginalized populations infected and affected by HIV/AIDS to serve the better service to PLHIV. Our members include besides PLHIV, people from diverse orientation and marginalized sections of the society â€“ MSM (Men having Sex with Men), IDU (Injecting Drug Users), Sex workers, TG/TS etc.
